MVDA.description: The MVIS CryptoCompare Digital Assets 100 Index (MVDA) is a market cap-weighted index which tracks the performance of the 100 largest digital assets. The index serves as benchmark and universe for the other MVIS CryptoCompare Digital Assets Indices.
MVDA.size_requirements: Index covers the top 100 digital assets by market capitalisation (80-120 buffer).
